DOC.brief_summary: The investigator would assess if there is an incremental energy load during mechanical ventilation in Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome (ARDS) patients.
DOC.brief_title: Energy Load in Patients With Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome (ARDS)
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator would study the inspiratory and expiratory pressure volume curve in ARDS patients and investigate if there is a correlation between the energy loss (hysteresis curve) and the severity of disease.
DOC.criteria: ARDS patients pediatric population Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) patients with hemodynamic instability
